trans-unit.source: Implements the `GetFrameworkPath` task.
trans-unit.target: 實作`GetFrameworkPath`工作。

trans-unit.source: Use the `GetFrameworkPath` element in your project file to create and execute this task.
trans-unit.target: 使用`GetFrameworkPath`專案檔來建立和執行這項工作中的項目。

trans-unit.source: For usage and parameter information, see [GetFrameworkPath Task](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 用法和參數資訊，請參閱[GetFrameworkPath Task](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.GetFrameworkPath"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.GetFrameworkPath"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>在所有情況下。

trans-unit.source: There is no execution that takes place for the `GetFrameworkPath` task, instead the task supports only getting and setting of properties.
trans-unit.target: 所需的位置沒有執行`GetFrameworkPath`工作中，而是由工作支援只取得和設定的屬性。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>在所有情況下。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the path of the folder that contains the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 1.1 assemblies.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定包含資料夾路徑[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]1.1 版組件。

trans-unit.source: The path of the folder that contains the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 1.1 assemblies.
trans-unit.target: 包含的資料夾路徑[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]1.1 版組件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the path of the folder that contains the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 2.0 assemblies.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定包含資料夾路徑[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]2.0 組件。

trans-unit.source: The path of the folder that contains the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 2.0 assemblies.
trans-unit.target: 包含的資料夾路徑[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]2.0 組件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the path of the folder that contains the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 3.0 assemblies.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定包含資料夾路徑[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]3.0 組件。

trans-unit.source: The path of the folder that contains the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 3.0 assemblies.
trans-unit.target: 包含的資料夾路徑[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]3.0 組件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the path of the folder that contains the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 3.5 assemblies.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定包含資料夾路徑[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]3.5 組件。

trans-unit.source: The path of the folder that contains the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 3.5 assemblies.
trans-unit.target: 包含的資料夾路徑[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]3.5 組件。

trans-unit.source: Path to the v4.0 framework, if available
trans-unit.target: 路徑 v4.0 framework 中，如果有的話

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Path to the v4.5 framework, if available
trans-unit.target: 路徑至&4;.5 版 framework，如果有的話

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the path of the folder that contains the latest version of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] assemblies.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定包含最新版本的資料夾路徑[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]組件。

trans-unit.source: The path of the folder that contains the latest version of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] assemblies.
trans-unit.target: 包含的最新版本的資料夾路徑[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]組件。
